description: Mr Elbridge Colby, tipped as national security adviser if Trump comes to power, says the US needs to focus on Asia. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: If we fail against China, nobody can save you: Trump ally’s message to Asia
title_page: If we fail against China, nobody can save you: Trump ally’s message to Asia | The Straits Times
maintext:
Former US president Donald Trump churned through four national security advisers during his turbulent 2017-2021 term – a revolving door that set a record.
Now, as the 2024 race nears its climax, the question looms: Who will be Trump’s point man in the White House Situation Room if he defeats Vice-President Kamala Harris?
